website_summaries.verdict: For any woman looking for a discreet and lightweight pair of bowling shoes, these are a sure bet.
pros: These bowling shoes resemble regular sneakers, sporting a sleek design
Neutral colors ensure that these will match any outfit
They are durable and can hold up to many rounds of bowling
cons: Shoes are a bit narrow in the front
Those with wide feet may want to size up

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love These Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes because they look like a regular tennis shoe and got some big bulky duffy looking bowling shoes like I had before. The reviews are saying they run a little small. I normally wear a 7 1/2 so I ordered an 8. I would have to say that they are true to size because the eighth is a tiny bit big. That's not a problem though because I usually wear socks when I bowl so they should fit perfectly. They're a very comfortable shoe and they look fantastic on. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Deb W.

customer_reviews.title: ... bowl weekly so my only comparison is to those crappy shoes you rent at the bowling alley
customer_reviews.text: I am an amateur bowler and have begun to bowl weekly so my only comparison is to those crappy shoes you rent at the bowling alley. I especially like the fact that these look like sneakers and not typical bowling shoes, they are also rather comfortable and true to size. After about 1 month I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for league bowling
customer_reviews.text: I am a (first time) league bowler that bowls once a week and these shoes have held up wonderfully after months of wear. I have gotten lots of compliments on these shoes and love that they don't look like bowling shoes at all. To be honest, I don't slide very much with these shoes, but that is ok with me because I don't want to be THAT league bowler that slides down the lane (lol). I have narrow feet and ordered a size 8.5, which it typically what I wear in athletic shoes and they fit like a glove with standard ankle socks.
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Jessica Kittle

customer_reviews.title: Good fit but uncomfortable heel
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a good width for me, but I have pretty narrow feet. I’m glad I got a half size bigger than what I get at the bowling alley. However, the back of the shoe was very uncomfortable for me so I returned them. The canvas is pretty stiff and there is a seam at the back of the heel that rubs.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 in most every women’s shoe, and regular width, not narrow or wide. So I ordered an 8 in these. They are very tight and short. I could probably have gone up to a 9 and I have never worn a 9 in any shoe. They are a quality made shoe. I just wish I had ordered a size up before taking them to bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce and Kathy O'Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dexters!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look!can't wait to be able to try the out! Ordered a 1/2 size larger and is perfect as there narrow in the front!arch looks good and sole looks thick but good for dexters!I've been bowling for years and it's hard to find shoes in my size as I have a small foot but these fit almost perfect!
customer_reviews.author: kerensafrog

customer_reviews.title: True fit
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that I needed to get a smaller size because they were bowling shoes. Fortunately they fit the size that I actually wear. So I didn't have to return them. They are very comfortable and I have received a lot of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: CRiley

customer_reviews.title: Size up!! But I love!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of these shoes, I also like how light weight they are. But I will say SIZE UP! They run very small. I sized up a half size and wish I would of sized up a full size. They are finally stretching out a little after around 4weeks of bowling. I’d purchase again, and I love Dexter brand for bowling shoes, however like I said. Size up.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: love bowling
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my husband has been on a bowling kick. I got them on ebay first because I had a coupon but I got my actual size and they were too small. I had to go up a full size. I wear a 9 and had to go up to a 10. I think they are a good quality though
customer_reviews.author: Keirahc13

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought my normal size and they fit great. I am a novice bowler so I can't really comment on performance other than they work great for me and save me from renting shoes each time.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a serious bowler, but play on a league Monday nights. I have found these shoes to be really comfortable and light weight. I really didn't like to wear the bowling alley shoes, but was scared about ordering bowling shoes online (everyone else ordered theirs at the bowling alley). SO glad I found these. Run true to size (size 6.5).
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks attractive
customer_reviews.text: Good solid shoe. Not flimsy material. At first I thought they were too tight, but once I stepped out into the lanes, I found they fit perfectly. My game still sucks, but at least I’ve got quality attractive shoes.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome perfect bowling shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bowling shoes are so stylish and cute! I absolutely love them! They fit true to size and look exactly like the photos. I am on a monthly bowling league with my husband and I was able to wear them for our last game and they were great! They don't even look like bowling shoes, just like regular tennis shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No, just no.
customer_reviews.text: Horribly uncomfortable! You may as well be barefoot with the lack of padding in the foot bed. As other reviews have also stated, they are extremely narrow which in itself wasn't an issue but the fact that I cinched the laces as tight as they would go, my foot would still slip at the heel. No, these are not at all as you would think they would be. My old Dexters felt like a tennis shoe with padding and flexibility. These, no.
customer_reviews.author: Drenda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality. Very comfortable and stylish. Just as described in every way. I am usually a size 8.5. The 9 fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: catherine denny

customer_reviews.title: Run small, heel is uncomfortable in side at seam. Slide good.
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I got a 1/2 size bigger. I wear an 8 got 8 1/2. They run small and narrow. They fit my foot just fine but don’t like the heel. Inside at the top edge there is 2 seams sewn together and is uncomfortable. It folds down when you put them on almost need a shoe horn so it doesn’t turn down. But who wants to bring a shoe horn to the bowling alley? I don’t. They slide good. That I did want.
customer_reviews.author: tracy mort

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Exactly as described. Looks great too. Not like regular bowling shoes. I love it. Also love that it was cheaper to buy on Amazon than in the store. $75 to buy in bowling stores.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fitting!
customer_reviews.text: Sending back...I think these are the type of shoe that, even if I go up a whole size, they are NOT going to be comfortable - at least not for those that don't have narrow feet. I am returning for credit. I wear and 8.5 and it was painful even getting my feet into them. Took off immediately and packed them up. I think Dexters are problematic in general as far as fit. My old golf shoes were never really a good fit either.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Milner

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good slide
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes based on the reviews which did not let me down. I got them right before a tournament and they fit perfect to size and had good slide. They are light and comfortable. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowling shoes and for the times we have gone bowling, these shoes have paid off. I bought a size 9, it fits perfectly and they feel comfortable. Remember to buy the size you get when you rent bowling shoes. I have gotten so many compliments, and I love them because they look like reg shoes. Def. reccomend!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but hard to break in
customer_reviews.text: The only thing keeping these from getting 5 stars is that they’re still giving me blisters after months of wear. They’re really cute and comfy apart from blisters on my heels though. They do take a few days to slide right though.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherG

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My old pair of Dexters were so uncomfortable. Hard and stiff. Just never softened up. These were comfortable the first time I put them on. Highly recommend to anyone who wants new bowling shoes. Like wearing sneakers but with the support of bowling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: P E Jones

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are everything I had hoped for. They are comfortable, function well, and look stylish. They fit perfectly (I wear an 8 and ordered an 8) and are so comfortable that it’s easy to forget you’re wearing bowling shoes and almost leave the alley still wearing them. I have received tons of compliments on these and love that they look like regular shoes. If these weren’t bowling shoes, I would wear them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sari

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and working great!
customer_reviews.text: At first, the shoes appeared to have different amounts of stuffing in the heels, but wearing them proved to not matter and they are comfortable. I have worn these a few times so far and they are so much more comfortable than renting shoes. True to my sneaker size, 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: LS Facenda

customer_reviews.title: Light, stylish, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Super light - which is what I wanted and very feminine. True to size but narrow so they did take a few weeks to break in but now they are great. The color is great too, show very little dirt or smudges and the sole give just the right slide.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon K

customer_reviews.title: These were comfortable out of box and have held up well
customer_reviews.text: Joined a bowling league and didn't want to wear those tired rental shoes. These were comfortable out of box and have held up well. Many fellow bowlers wear these and all are happy. Great beginner shoe at a good price. Came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Valueformydollar

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and the look. You do need to wear thicker socks or break in the heel back really well first. They didn’t slide as well as I like, but a little graphite from a pencil fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: rsvale

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Loads of positive comments and the shoes look very sharp. Wear well. I would have rated higher, but I do not know how they will last. So far, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Battles

customer_reviews.title: Back heel collapsed.
customer_reviews.text: I have big feet so I ordered an 11. They are NARROW so if you have wide feet you don't want these. The biggest issue is the heel. It felt like it had collapsed like someone had walked on it (like when you put on shoes without untying them and the back park folds down). It bushed into the back of my heel and hurt. I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Size Like Chucks (1/2 size up from normal)
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and they look like "normal" shoes! I find these run slightly narrow. If you're used to Chuck Taylors, size these shoes exactly the same way. Otherwise, I'd recommend sizing up a half size for comfort for narrow to regular widths.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: bowling shoes that don't look like bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: wife likes these shoes. They look good and saved us a bundle at the bowling alley. Its nice that the shoes don't actually look like a rental special. they fit true to size and are comfy for her feet
customer_reviews.author: R. Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started going bowling every weekend and decided I needed my own pair of bowling shoes. I love these. They are pretty comfy and I get many compliments. They are true to size. I wear a size 6 whenever I wear the shoes the bowling alley provides (I believe they always run a little bigger) but I wear a size 7.5 in these. Hope that helps! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Feels like you are wearing sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes/ I’ve been bowling for 30 years and these are one of the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever bowled in. So great In fact that I bought 3 pairs just to have backups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value bowling shoes - my wife likes them a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good value bowling shoes - my wife likes them a lot, except they are a little too wide for her foot. However, the color scheme won her over despite the size issue.
customer_reviews.author: GregfromGolden

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Looks great! I normally wear 7.5 in tennis shoes and that's the size I ordered. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: not very cushiony like the last pair of dexters i have but very ...
customer_reviews.text: not very cushiony like the last pair of dexters i have but very stylish and not plain almost looks like Vans. I recommend to break these in a few times before league bowling.
customer_reviews.author: crystal meyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very well made and worth the money. The slide pad on the toe is durable. My only issue was the tightness of the shoe as i have wide feet. Even loosening the shoe to the maximum space did not help. Other than this the shoe is a great quality and perfect for bowling on a league or just for fun!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Shoes not up to standards of Dexter.
customer_reviews.text: Heel was too stiff and narrow. Since I must pay a restocking fee and shipping to return it - Goodwill got a new pair of bowling shoes. Will never order shoes online again. I have another pair of Dexter bowling shoes that I have worn out (bought from a bowling alley). They fit fine and are the same size but apparently the quality of Dexter has diminished over the years.
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These bowling shoes are perfect! They’re true to size, lightweight, comfortable and CUTE! I love the color :)
customer_reviews.author: Emma W

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bowling shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. It does not feel like I am wearing bowling shoes. As for fit, I typically wear an 8.5 in sneakers, but the 8 in this shoe fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L. Foerster

customer_reviews.title: No Splits here!
customer_reviews.text: I never really buy shoes on line but most athletic stores have shut down. These were perfect fit and good quality for bowling!
customer_reviews.author: DrT

customer_reviews.title: Runs half a size big/digs into the back of your foot
customer_reviews.text: These look good for bowling shoes. Fit well but run a little tiny bit big...about a half size. There's another review on here that says the back of the shoe cuts into your heel, which is absolutely true. It'll be painful breaking them in but then they should be fine. I'm taking two stars off for the heel thing.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Gambill

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not enough room
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoes but they were too tight across the top of my foot so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. A tiny bit small but are fine if I wear thin socks. Supportive bowling shoe and look super cute!
customer_reviews.author: DENISE CIRELLI

customer_reviews.title: These are not men's shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Despite showing up under the men's bowling shoes search these are women's shoes. Unfortunately, this wasn't very clear until they arrived. On the other hand, they do look like a good pair of shoes and feel sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin H

customer_reviews.title: Returned not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe is too stiff, and hurt my Achilles. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Keigley

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Watch the Size though
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. I had originally ordered them in my normal shoes size of 8.5 but once I got them they were too small I couldn’t even get my foot in the shoe. I exchanged them for the 9.5 and the fit is perfect. They are very comfortable and they also arrived in time for me to wear them for bowling league even with the exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and I love that they look like regular shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, pinches one foot. May not be able to bowl ever again because I have had back surgery recently and hope the Dr.s are wrong about that.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Get your normal size!!
customer_reviews.text: I got a half size larger because of the reviews and I wish I had just gotten my size. They would have been perfect. I love these. They are comfortable and super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ana V

customer_reviews.title: Product was as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Had to return as the wifey got wrong size. Looked comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Silbys

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bowling shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are soft and comfortable. The sliding was perfect. I wear 81/2 sandal, 9 med shoe. I ordered 91/2 and fit good with slim booty sock. I think with thicker socks a 10 would be better. They do run 1/2 size small I think.
customer_reviews.author: el

customer_reviews.title: Size up...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size larger than I normally wear and they’re too small. I don’t even want to try to bowl with them because that are so uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these ! Don’t feel like bowling shoes at all
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were not comfortable at all. There was no softness to them....plus they seemed very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dever

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: They feel just like a tennis shoe! Lightweight, comfortable and affordable. That’s way more that could be said about the non supportive clown shoes you rent from the bowling alley. If you go bowling a couple times they will pay for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Shoe but size was different than a dexter ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking Shoe but size was different than a dexter we tried on at a store, Amazon took care of return, all good!!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Shaw

customer_reviews.title: X/X. Great first game
customer_reviews.text: Long overdue for new shoes. Great fit, comfortable and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in fit.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were too tight. I wear a 9.5 in the brand and these don't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, I use for bowling, it’s comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Anoush Balian

customer_reviews.title: Like them...
customer_reviews.text: Really like these bowling shoes. They look like tennis shoes and not the traditional bowling shoe.
customer_reviews.author: AG Rios

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, I can wear them comfortably all night ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, I can wear them comfortably all night for league. I have a slightly wide foot (can still wear standard shoes normally without too much discomfort) so they could be a little wider for my preference, but they are still wearable. Slide is nice and they look stylish
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kate Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Stiff Toes
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and fit but the toe area is a little stiff for canvas; that's why rated 4 and not 5.. I've put them on shoe stretchers and seems to help. I'm pretty sure once I break them in, I will really enjoy these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: FalPal

customer_reviews.title: Always check your product
customer_reviews.text: I received my shoes but did not open them until I needed to, my mistake. The shoes have clearly been worn before as the sole on the bottom is worn away and frayed. There are multiple pulls on the outside of the shoes as well. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gavarone

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great bowling shoes..
customer_reviews.text: They fit really nice going to try them out tonight bowling. Great price checked 2 bowling shops near me and these were cheaper by far and more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Bikerchick

customer_reviews.title: Good solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Pretty low key purple accents. Comfortable, good bowling shoe. Good price. Got respect in the bowling community because of the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Glasper

customer_reviews.title: I loved these shoes when I got them but I normally ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes when I got them but I normally wear a 8.5-9 so I ordered 8.5 and it was way too tight on my foot and very stiff so I had to return them and bought other shoes that were same day delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Super Cute and Comfortable"
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend and she loves them. They slide well and she has no issues or complaints.....
customer_reviews.author: Travis G.

customer_reviews.title: Bowling shoe size tends to run smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Shoes tend to run small. I ordered size 8.5 medium. Took awhile to break-in. Probably will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: curlyjigs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice shoes and I love that they don't look like the typical bowling show.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are very comfortable and don't look like typical bowling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with product. Joined a bowling league a wanted my own shoes . Work great every week
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Besner

customer_reviews.title: Like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: As some of reviews I read said they were a little tight. Overall, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, not super comfy but not uncomfortable either. They run a bit small so i would recommend ordering up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Quesodip

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it ... It fits perfectly for me.. Haven't wear it yet till in the fall as bowling league ... They look like tennis shoes ... Also it s really comfortable and lightly weight .
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bowling shoes for my teenage bowler! Looks great, but the shoes were stiff and tight. Made for narrow small feet. They took some breaking in on the heal area, but a very nice purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mom & her 2kids advice

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow, but nice slide
customer_reviews.text: These have a nice slide on them, but they were way too narrow for me even after going up to an 8 from my normal 7.5. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: sillygirl

customer_reviews.title: Good to buy used
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, I purchased these used, but they are in perfect shape. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Kupris

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice Shoes, comfortable, I would say true to size. I took another reviewer recommendation and ordered a 1/2 size up. I should have stuck with my normal (95% of the time) size. Fit is still fine for my needs, I just wear a heavier sock.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit true to size. There was some uncomfortable rubbing on my heels when I first wore them, but now that they are broken in, they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow cut, made for feet skinnier than mine ...
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow cut , made for feet skinnier than mine. Returned with no problems
customer_reviews.author: gail carnes

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Shoe size what as expected, I bought my normal tennis shoe size. Very comfortable shoe and stylish color.
customer_reviews.author: HikerRN99

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They do run a bit big but they are great shoes! Very good look to them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Not your typical heavy rubber bowling shoe. Lightweight and stylish
customer_reviews.author: eb mo

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Tight!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so tight that I had to take off the laces for a more comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I am happy not to be wearing rented shoes anymore!
customer_reviews.author: M. Skerik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lady’s bowling shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say... I’m a beginner. Love my shoes. Love that they don’t really look like a bowling shoe. Comfortable. Good color. Not bulking. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and slide.
customer_reviews.text: I love, love love these bowling shoes. I wear a size 8.5 and that is what I ordered, the fit is great. I do not like to slip a lot, and give you just the amount that I love.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Had to go up a half size for my wife's feet to feel comfortable, but the seller was great about an exhange and worked with us when the needed size was on back order.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this size 6.5 and returned it for a 7.5 which is perfect. The shoes are great. BUT IAM STILL WAITING FOR MY $49.00 REFUND. of the 6.5 SIZE. WHICH I PROMPTLY RETURNED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Wore them to my monthly bowling night and they were great. People wanted to know where I got my cute shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes but even though i ordered my size they were just too small for me and a bit thin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Libbie K

customer_reviews.title: Love them, way comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a return and love them. Buy used, go with a half size bigger than your normal bowling shoe and I’d say your golden. I joined a league, for fun league, and it was cheaper to buy my own than keep renting every time!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love that these do not look like traditional bowling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are sooooo comfortable! Light and don't make my feet sweat like the rental shoes do.
customer_reviews.author: J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Dexter makes a great bowling shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and feel great. Very pleased with this on line purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes but they run small...I always wear an 8.5 but really need a 9...I can't find a way to exchange them...Can you let me know how to do this?
customer_reviews.author: Constance Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Happy with shoes, but they run small in size!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes run very small! I would go up a size when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: MJK

customer_reviews.title: An up-to-date version of a bowling shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowling shoes. They are modern and quite comfortable. I get a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Debi L

customer_reviews.title: next time perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Felt a little right the first time I wore them... next time perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Wilson

product_meta.title: Dexter Kerrie Bowling Shoes
product_meta.description: Master you bowling game in the cool and classic Kerrie from Dexter®. Lightweight cotton canvas uppers. Classic CVO upper pattern. Lightly cushioned tongue and collar. Traditional lace-up closure. Medial side vents offer added breathability. Features a molded, removable blown EVA footbed for added comfort. Features S8 microfiber slide outsoles on both shoes. Soft, Slide-Rite™ forefoot outsole. Features a durable, non-marking rubber outsole with a defined heel. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 11 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Lightweight and cool cotton Canvas upper
Refer size chart for perfect fit
